document_data.name: Salene Freig
document_data.mainbody:
'''Salene Freig''' was a [[broadsheet]] delivery clerk employed by [[Baldur's Mouth]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Busy, busy, busy... Huh? You still standing there gawking? Shove off!''|Salene Freig}}
document_data.Description: Salene was a [[human]] woman with a light tan complexion. The woman had long, dark brown hair, and eyes of the same color. She wore simple garb of a common delivery woman.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Salene worked on managing the delivery of freshly printed ''Baldur's Mouth Gazette'' bundles. During the [[Absolute crisis]], she could be often be found within Baldur's Mouth's offices in [[Heapside]] of the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]].
